translations: 不能清洗的：指某些物品或材料无法用水或其他清洗剂进行清洗。
· This fabric is unwashable, so you should only spot clean it.
这种面料不能清洗，所以你只能进行局部清洁。

sentences.sentence: Clothing which has been sprayed by an American skunk is unwashable even with the strongest detergent.
sentences.translation: 衣服如果被美国臭鼬喷到，即便是用最强力的洗涤剂也洗不掉那种气味。
